local_intent: Align to maroon_square, set yaw 0, confirm visibility, push 0.15 m to 0 deg under 1500 ms timeout, then retreat 0.10 m and wait 500 ms.
assumptions: Free path to the right on table surface during push
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase: ApproachAndAlign -> SetTCPYaw(0) -> IsObjectVisible -> Timeout-wrapped Push(distance 0.15, direction 0, 1500 ms) -> Retreat 0.10 -> Wait 500, matching GLOBAL_BT and task description.
